phrases: Does the phrase, Zawsze in love ring a bell?
Wait, how do you know about that?
So you have,
have not you?
What is going on here?
I mean, those are the same words from when that girl and I made our promise.
The other day, I found my old diary, and it made me remember all kinds of things.
Ten years ago, I met a certain boy,
and we played together all summer long, becoming close friends.
And when it came time to part ways,
I made some kind of promise with him.
But that is exactly like my own memory.
No, it is the same as Onodera's...
I do not remember his name or what he looked like anymore,
but what I do remember are those words.
Oh, and another thing
This was stuck inside my diary.
That key!
You recognize it?
Uh, no...
I admit that it did seem familiar at first glance.
But it cannot be...
Onodera is supposed to be the girl.
But Chitoge's got a key too,
and she knows that phrase!
I made a promise with the girl that I met all those years ago.
That we would open up this locket together when we were reunited.
So if she still remembers our promise, then she would have the key for sure.
Are you saying my key's...
Episode 12: Confirmation
Episode 12: Confirmation
Episode 12: Confirmation
There is no way that could be true, right?
I know, right?
No chance in hell!
Yeah!
And besides, I do not recall ever meeting you in my life!
And you are totally different from the girl I have in mind!
Yup.
It is clearly impossible.
This is just one big coincidence.
After all, you are nothing like the boy I wrote about in my diary!
Unlike you, the boy in my diary was sweet, and so handsome!
You would not believe how attractive he was!
Oh, is that right?
Well, unlike you, the girl I am thinking about is cute, feminine, and flawless!
Oh, yeah?
Well, it goes without saying,
but why would I be so torn up over leaving you that I would make some weird promise?
How ludicrous!
Right back at you!
Why would someone ever fall for you?
You want to try opening it, just to make sure?
If your key's the real deal, then my locket will open, right?
If it does not, then you and I have no connection.
Well, not that it is going to open, anyway!
I do not see a problem with it.
It is not like you are that boy.
Unlike you, he is like a prince.
He can do anything, and he always comes to save me!
Oh, yeah?
You sure talk big, do not you?
Okay, if it does turn out that we made a promise, what will you do?
If it is you, I will do anything you want!
I will even kiss you!
You name it!
B-Bring it on, then!
I will do whatever you say!
Because there is no way you are him!
S-Sure!
All right then, ready when you are!
It is not going to open, no way it is going to open!
There is no way she is that girl.
Just watch me!
You will see soon enough!
There is just no chance that it is you!
Here I go!
Are you ready?
Well hey, I know it is impossible, but if you insist, I have no choice.
Right, show me the money!
Just leave it to me!
I will make it clear to you in a second!
It is a fact that you and I do not have a thing to do with each other!
All right, that is the spirit!
Come on!
Just do it!
Do not worry, you will be laughing out of the other side of your mouth soon enough!
Just the notion that you and I were friends years ago is ridiculous enough.
Hurry up and do it!
Here goes.
It is in!
I-It snapped in two!
What were you thinking, using your brute strength to turn it!?
Hey!
I could not help it!
I was so nervous I twisted it too hard!
Oh man, what am I going to do now?
Now it is stuck inside!
Look!
I do not care!
Do not look at me!
It is not my problem!
What the hell?
Now I cannot try Onodera's key!
My locket!
Well, it is no big deal.
There is no way you and I ever made a promise, anyway.
All right, end of story!
Hey!
Do not run away!
Where do you think you are going?
To where everybody else is.
What the hell?
How can she just shrug it off?
But if it had opened,
what do you think we would have done?
Damn it!
Now both Onodera and Kirisaki are talking about ten-year-old promises and keys.
No way this is just a coincidence.
Does this mean that one of them is the girl I made that promise with after all?
In other words, I met one of them all those years ago?
If I could just figure out who I met, then I will know who the girl is.
Which one is it?
Ah, long time no see, Raku-kun.
Did you come to celebrate her birthday?
Thank you very much.
Who is this old guy again?
I know him from somewhere.
Oh, hey!
He is the gangster boss from the other day!
Kirisaki's old man.
Good evening.
Now, then.
Are you getting along with my daughter?
Sorry about your predicament.
We suddenly forced you to take on the serious task of pretending to be her boyfriend.
No...
Well...
Since we have come to Japan, she seems to be enjoying herself every day.
I am sure it is thanks to you.
I truly appreciate it.
Does she really?
Wait, she did say that she never had any friends when she lived in America.
No, I do not really think I have done that much.
Well, you two do have good chemistry.
I was sure you would get along just fine.
Chemistry?
We do not have any!
Whenever we are together, we do nothing but fight!
I am sure that is not the case.
You two played together so much as kids, after all.
What?
As kids?
Wait, what do you mean?
Oh, I do not blame you for not remembering.
It was ten years ago.
Back then, your father and I were engaged in talks for almost a month in a certain part of Japan.
Chitoge was five at the time, so I had brought her along.
It was not until we were about to wind down our talks
that we realized how close you two had become.
You two seemed to be having so much fun together.
That is why it still lingers in my mind.
Kirisaki and I met each other ten years ago!
No way!
Then that means...
The girl I made that promise with was Kirisaki,
and Onodera must have mistaken me for someone else.
The world works in mysterious ways, does not it?
What?
Who knew that it would not just be you two,
but her as well?
To think that you all would be reunited at this age.
Her?
You know, the one you came with today.
I am talking about her.
Back then, the three of you would play together often.
What?!
Are you serious?
What the hell?
Could this be destiny too, I wonder?
I see!
All those years ago, it was not that I met one or the other...
Really, Chitoge-chan!
This party is for you!
Where have you been?
Sorry!
Come to think of it, I have not seen Ichijou-kun around, either.
Huh?
Oh, b-beats me!
Knowing him, he probably lost his way somewhere in the house.
So I met both of them when we were kids!
Ten years ago, in the same place...
In other words, it is not one or the other who I made a promise with,
it is both.
Both Kirisaki and Onodera...
Never in my wildest dreams would I have imagined that.
There is just one thing...
Why are there two keys?
They both said that they would made a promise with someone ten years ago.
But the person I made my promise with,
was just one girl and no one else.
When we reunite,
let us get married
All right, Raku-kun, you have yourself a good time.
Okay.
So, which one is it?
Supposing it is Onodera...
If it turns out to be Onodera, that would be like fate!
Ichijou Kosaki has a nice ring to it!
Hey, what am I thinking?
Am I an idiot?
Okay, then supposing it is Kirisaki...
Huh?
What would I do, then?
Until today, it never occurred to me that Kirisaki might be the girl!
You cannot just suddenly break that to me and expect me to accept it!
What am I thinking?
Even if Kirisaki does turn out to be that girl,
it was just something we did when we were kids, right?
Right now, my eyes are for Onodera only.
Nothing can change that.
Nothing can change that.
Yo, Uncle!
Well?
Do you think you can fix that item I gave you?
Oh, is that you, Shuu-kun?
This one's going to be tougher to fix than I thought.
It is kind of a rare type.
I can handle it, more or less, but it is going to take a while.
I see.
Well, I am counting on you, all right?
So?
You are going to get me that photo collection, are not you?
It is a limited edition, and autographed!
A fine piece, good sir!
All right!
Now you have really got me fired up!
And that is how it is.
So rest easy.
I see.
What a relief.
It looks like my locket's going to be okay.
Well?
What is the story behind the locket?
How about coming clean about it now?
Sorry.
I will tell you all about it another time.
Oh, hi.
Good morning, Raku.
Hey.
Morning.
Oh, right.
You know how we busted your key and my locket yesterday?
Looks like they are going to be fixed.
Shuu's uncle is a locksmith, see.
Oh?
Is that right?
All's well that ends well.
What the hell?
After yesterday's fiasco, you are going to act like nothing happened?
Even though you went as far to say that you would kiss me!
It is Four Eyes again!
I guess that makes today another surveillance day, huh.
All right, let us pour our souls into this lovers' act today!
Come on, honey!
Eep!
Eep?
H-Hey!
Why is your face all red?
It is not!
Would you mind not making things up?
Get a hold of yourself.
Four Eyes is watching us, you know.
You do not have to tell me!
Lovers, right?
Morning, Kirisaki-san and Ichijou-kun!
Not going to wait till night to turn up the heat, huh?
I know, right?
Right?
What can I say?
We are just that head-over-heels for each other!
We sure are!
What do you think you are doing?
Sh-Shut up, will you?
Just leave me alone, all right?
Huh?
What is her problem?
Wh-What is wrong with me?
Stay calm, stay calm.
Ichijou-kun.
Onodera?
Do not you think Chitoge-chan was acting a little odd earlier?
You think so too, Onodera?
There is something weird about her today.
Did you two have an argument?
No, not quite.
Could it be that she is feeling self-conscious about possibly being the girl I made the promise with?
Nah, no way, right?
Huh?
Ichijou-kun, where is your locket?
Oh, that.
Actually, I had to send it in for repairs this morning.
I am sure I will get it back soon, though.
Oh, I see.
Onodera.
If you find out that we met before, years ago,
what kind of expression will you make?
Oh crap!
My heart's pounding just thinking about it!
Well, I am worried about Chitoge, but she should be all right.
I bet she was just feeling under the weather.
I will be sure to keep a close eye on her.
You will?
Then I guess it should be fine.
Chitoge-chan said that she and Ichijou-kun were only pretending to be dating.
But I wonder how Ichijou-kun truly feels.
All right, class, listen up!
The photos from the field trip have been developed,
and they have been posted on the bulletin board,
so write down the number of the ones you want and turn them in, okay?
Okay!
Also, make sure you get your crush's photos, even if it embarrasses you!
Do not worry, I would not be so lame as to reveal who bought what!
How can she say that?
You mean we can buy whichever ones we like?
That is right, but do not buy too many, okay?
They are actually 100 yen per photo.
That is pretty expensive.
Just pick out the ones you want the most.
I want this one, too.
Hey, and this onewe're all in it!
Mistress!
There is a prime one over here!
Really?
Check!
I am checking that number!
Listen to me, both of you!
This is something I have always dreamed about, you know!
Really, Kirisaki-san, you have got to be exaggerating!
Well, it looks like she is back to normal, which is all I can ask for.
Okay, why do not we go take a look too?
R-Right, good idea.
All right, let me get at least one photo of Onodera.
I want one of you and me, Ruri-chan.
I do not really care.
What?
Hey, how about this one?
You and I are both in it, Kosaki.
What?
Let us see...
This one?
So tiny!
I bet we could find something better if we keep looking.
Wait, is not this me?
I meant well!
Hey, look at this!
You and Kosaki are in it, Raku!
What?
What should I do?
I want it!
But if it gets out that I bought something like that...
Oh...
Oh, man, sure is hard to find a good one!
You know, a photo that I would want!
Y-Yes, you are right!
These two really get on my nerves.
Hey, hey, good sir, what type of photograph might you be looking for?
I have some fine products over here.
Would you be interested in one?
Shuu?
Here, you will find photos of the girls as you would normally never get to see them, taken by yours truly!
And I must say business is booming!
Maiko!
I want number 13!
Number 94 for me!
What?
Are you selling inappropriate photos of the girls?
How heinous.
Pervert!
Scum!
Drop dead!
No, no, it is not what you think, I swear!
And you berate me all too viciously.
Inappropriate photos of girls?
That goes against my principles!
What I seek are...
Incredibly embarrassing shots and no more!
Look, I have got one of you and Ruri-chan, too.
As a token of our new acquaintanceship...
What do you say?
Does it float your boat?
Whoa!
Hey, hold up!
I kind of want to see it.
That is right, Raku, here is something special for you.
How much?
500 yen.
I will take it.
Thanks for your patronage!
This will be my treasure.
Now if I can just find a shot with both Onodera and me.
Wait... this photo...
Who is that behind Kirisaki?
It is Onodera!
This is a photo of her changing clothes!
You need to do a better job of censoring, Sensei!
If someone were to buy it and see her like this...
Thank goodness, not many people have seen the photos around here yet.
I am going to tell the teacher before anyone notices,
and have her delete the original file too.
Oh, my bad.
Oh, I am so sorry.
Onodera...
Ichijou-kun...
Hey, the photo!
Is this yours, Ichijou-kun?
Oh, crap!
If she sees that photo, it will look like I am the one going after a shot of her changing!
Thanks for picking that up for me!
See ya!
Close call, close call!
I came this close to being labeled a pervert!
That photo just now... was a shot of Chitoge-chan.
Why would Ichijou-kun...
Ichijou-kun, are you actually...
Well, I sure got my hands on an awesome photo today!
Maybe I will frame it.
I would better make sure Onodera does not find out.
So I still do not know which one's the girl I made that promise with.
But how am I supposed to figure it out?
Oh, man, if only it was like now and I still had photos from back then.
I bet it would at least give me a hint.
Huh?
Photos?
Yeah, we should still have some.
Hold on...
Where have they been all this time?
I have turned this house upside-down numerous times looking for them, you know!
Oh, in that case, no wonder you could not find them.
They are all locked up in the storehouse.
You are talking about the photos from that trip we took ten years ago, right?
If I am remembering this right, we did not have a lot of photos from those days,
but there should be just one left at the back of the storehouse.
Seriously, who knew that a clue about that girl still existed so close by?
But maybe now I can get a step closer to the truth.
I think you begged me to take that photo of you and that little girl with the key.
You mentioned something about an important promise you would made with her or something.
A girl with a key?
And an important promise?
